name: Running Guardian - Fastest Alien in Galaxy
name_original: Running Guardian - Fastest Alien in Galaxy
description:
Running Guardian - Fastest Alien in Galaxy is a FREE and fun adventure game!
Tap to Jump, double tap for double jump - make the guardian fly!
Get as far as possible and collect coins - that will give extra points!
Compare best scores in leaderboard - maybe you are new master of Galaxy!
Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Running Guardian - Fastest Alien in Galaxy is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
